{{cpp/chrono/title|1=operator&lt;&lt;{{petty|(std::chrono::weekday)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/weekday/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os, const std::chrono::weekday&amp; wd );
}}

If {{c|!wd.ok()}}, inserts {{c|wd.c_encoding()}} followed by {{c|" is not a valid weekday"}} into {{c|os}}. Otherwise, forms a {{c|std::basic_string&lt;CharT&gt;}} {{c|s}} consisting of the abbreviated weekday name for the weekday represented by {{c|wd}}, determined using the locale associated with {{c|os}}, and inserts {{c|s}} into {{c|os}}.

Equivalent to

{{cc|
return os &lt;&lt; (wd.ok() ?
    std::format(os.getloc(), STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:L%a}"), wd) :
    std::format(os.getloc(), STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{} is not a valid weekday"),
                wd.c_encoding()));
}}

where {{c|STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("...")}} is {{c|"..."}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|char}}, and {{c|L"..."}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|wchar_t}}.
